howWorksDesc1: Be sure to give permissions to use the camera.
howWorksDesc2: Scan the barcode using your camera and wait for the identification. If the code isn't associated to any box previously registered, you will be redirected to the registration screen. Insert the data and it's done deal!
howWorksDesc3: If the code corresponds to an existing box, it will be opened the information page, where you can read if you can throw the box or not.
howWorksDesc4: Don't want to scan? Open the history and scroll through all the registered boxes!
historyDesc: Here you can read the list with all the registered box, from the oldest one to the newest one.
pageNotFound: The page that you tried to open does not exist.
newBoxDesc: This box is not present in the database. Compile this form to save it as a new one.
name: Name
nameHint: Insert a name to remember what box is this.
codeHint: This is the barcode which will be saved. Check if it's correct.
dateHint: This date indicates the date to use in order to calculate the expiration date. With the inserted date, the expiration will be on
photoHint: Upload a photo to better remember the box.
uploadError: An error has occurred during the registration. The box has not been saved. Try again later.
deleteError: An error has occurred while deleting the box. Try again later.
cannotThrowBox: You can't throw the box yet
deleteBoxDisclaimer: Are you sure you want to delete this box? This action is irreversible.
alertDeleteDisclaimer: Warning: this box didn't exceed the expiry date yet.
rotateScreen: Rotate your device to use the app
